entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.9°C

Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 10:30 PM NST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 16 except minus 9 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight then periods of light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 16 except minus 9 along parts of the coast. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 07 January 2023
